mapper.select: select count(*) total_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000001,1,0)) wait_4_received_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000003,1,0)) wait_4_reviewed_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000005,1,0)) wait_4_retransmitted_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000002,1,0)) inspecting_count from system.task t where t.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
select count(*) total_count, sum(if(t.task_status = 1002000006,1,0)) finish_count from system.task t where t.create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
SELECT id,real_name name FROM system.`user` WHERE duty=2 group by id

select t.`code`,t.bridge_storey AS bridgeStorey,t.stake_begin AS stakeBegin,t.stake_end AS stakeEnd, t.code_name AS taskDetail,t.end_time AS deadTime, c.name AS componentName from system.task t JOIN system.task_component tc on t.id = tc.task_id JOIN system.component c on tc.component_id = c.id where (t.task_status,c.Inspection_frequency) = (#{taskStatus}, #{inspectionFrequency})

select t.code_name AS taskSummary, t.ramp, t.stake_begin AS stakeBegin,t.stake_end AS stakeEnd, GROUP_CONCAT(c.`name`) AS componentName from system.task t JOIN system.task_component tc on t.id = tc.task_id JOIN system.component c on tc.component_id = c.id where t.id = #{taskId}

select d.code id, d.code_name name, count(t.task_status) value from system.t_dictionary d left join system.task t on t.task_status = d.`code` where d.code in ('1002000001','1002000002','1002000003','1002000005') group by d.code;

SELECT DISTINCT t.id taskId,dd.code_name taskType,t.start_time startTime, t.end_time endTime, CONCAT(b.location,cc.`name`) inspectionPosition,u.real_name inspectorName,d.code_name taskStatus FROM system.t_task t LEFT JOIN system.`user` u ON t.inspector_id = u.id LEFT JOIN system.t_task_bridge_component tc ON t.id = tc.task_id LEFT JOIN system.t_bridge_info_component bc ON tc.bridge_component_id = bc.id LEFT JOIN system.t_component c ON bc.component_id = c.id LEFT JOIN system.t_component cc ON c.parent_id = cc.id LEFT JOIN system.t_bridge_info b ON b.id=bc.bridge_info_id LEFT JOIN system.t_dictionary d ON t.task_status = d.`code` LEFT JOIN system.t_dictionary dd ON t.task_type =dd.`code` WHERE u.id=#{id} group by t.id

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(b.location,cc.`name`) inspectionPosition FROM system.t_task_bridge_component tc LEFT JOIN system.t_bridge_info_component bc ON tc.bridge_component_id = bc.id LEFT JOIN system.t_component c ON bc.component_id= c.id LEFT JOIN system.t_component cc ON c.parent_id=cc.id LEFT JOIN system.t_bridge_info b ON bc.bridge_info_id=b.id WHERE tc.task_id=#{taskId}
SELECT DISTINCT bc.component_id FROM system.t_task_bridge_component tc LEFT JOIN system.t_bridge_info_component bc ON tc.bridge_component_id = bc.id WHERE tc.task_id=#{taskId}

select.foreach: SELECT IF(bc.component_id IN(2001000013,2001000014),GROUP_CONCAT(`stake_or_truss_number` SEPARATOR',' ), CONCAT_WS("~",CONCAT(SUBSTR(stake_or_truss_number,1,1),MIN(SUBSTR(stake_or_truss_number,2,3))), CONCAT(SUBSTR(stake_or_truss_number,1,1),MAX(SUBSTR(stake_or_truss_number,2,3)+0)))) componentName, c.`name` componentNumber FROM system.t_task_bridge_component tc LEFT JOIN system.t_bridge_info_component bc ON tc.bridge_component_id = bc.id LEFT JOIN system.t_component c ON bc.component_id= c.id LEFT JOIN system.t_bridge_info b ON bc.bridge_info_id=b.id WHERE tc.task_id=#{taskId} AND bc.component_id=#{item}

mapper.select: SELECT bic.scan_position AS id, d.code_name AS `name` FROM system.t_task_bridge_component tbc LEFT JOIN system.t_bridge_info_component bic ON tbc.bridge_component_id = bic.id LEFT JOIN system.t_dictionary d ON bic.scan_position = d.code WHERE tbc.task_id = #{taskId} GROUP BY bic.scan_position
